alert.note: Alert for Central Brewster County; Chinati Mountains; Chisos Basin; Davis Mountains; Davis Mountains Foothills; Lower Brewster County; Marfa Plateau; Presidio Valley; Van Horn and Highway 54 Corridor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 23 at 1:59PM CST until January 24 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 6 PM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Texas. * WHEN...From 9 AM to 6 PM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Motorists should exercise caution while driving in the wind advisory area. Be alert to sudden gusts of wind which may cause you to lose control of your vehicle.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
